parameters.name: SQLDBs
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| where sku !has "DataWarehouse"
| project id

parameters.name: SQLDWDBs
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.sql/servers/databases'
| where sku has "DataWarehouse"
| project id

items.name: Text - SQL DW Count of Logs

content.json:
## Count of Logs by Category

ðŸ’¡ *Select the type of SQL Logs to see logs*

items.name: Text - SQL DB Count of Logs

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| make-series Trend = count(Category) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Category
| extend jkey = 1
| join (
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| summarize Logs=count(Category) by Category
| extend jkey = 1
) on jkey
| project Category=Category1, Logs, Trend

parameters.name: Status
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
//| where Category in~ ({Category}) or '*' in~ ({Category})
| distinct Status_s
| where Status_s != ''

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| make-series Trend = count(Category) default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by Category
| extend jkey = 1
| join (
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| summarize Logs=count(Category) by Category
| extend jkey = 1
) on jkey
| project Category=Category1, Logs, Trend

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project Database=_ResourceId, TimeGenerated, ClusterName_s, NodeName_s, MachineName_s, AppName_s, AppTypeName_s, Level, intervalStartTime_t, intervalEndTme_t, databaseName_s, issueId_d, status_s, metric_s, value_d, impact_s, detections_s, rootCauseAnalysis_s, LogicalServerName_s, ElasticPoolName_s
| extend Details= pack_all()
| project Database, TimeGenerated, Details, status_s, metric_s, databaseName_s, rootCauseAnalysis_s, intervalStartTime_t, intervalEndTme_t

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| extend Deadlock = parse_xml(deadlock_xml_s)
| extend process = Deadlock.deadlock.["process-list"]
| extend resource = Deadlock.deadlock.["resource-list"]
| extend victim = Deadlock.deadlock.["victim-list"]
| project-away deadlock_xml_s, Deadlock 
| extend victim = victim.victimProcess.["@id"]
| extend transaction0 = process.process.[0].["@transactionname"]
| extend transaction1 = process.process.[1].["@transactionname"]
| extend transaction2 = process.process.[2].["@transactionname"]
| extend transaction3 = process.process.[3].["@transactionname"]
| project Database=_ResourceId, TimeGenerated, victim, transaction0, transaction1, transaction2, transaction3, ElasticPoolName_s, DatabaseName_s, SubscriptionId

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| summarize WaitTime=avg(total_query_wait_time_ms_d), ExecCount=sum(count_executions_d) by Database=_ResourceId, WaitType=wait_category_s, SubscriptionId
| top 20 by WaitTime desc

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| summarize DeltaWait=avg(delta_wait_time_ms_d), DeltaWaitCount=count(delta_waiting_tasks_count_d), DeltaSignalWait=avg(delta_signal_wait_time_ms_d) by Database=_ResourceId, WaitType=wait_type_s, SubscriptionId
| top 20 by DeltaWait desc

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| summarize Duration = sum(duration_d)/sum(count_executions_d)/100000,CPU = sum(cpu_time_d)/sum(count_executions_d)/100000 by Database=_ResourceId, SubscriptionId

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project Database=_ResourceId, TimeGenerated, error_state_d, query_hash_s, query_plan_hash_s, LogicalServerName_s, ElasticPoolName_s

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project Database = _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, Message, error_number_d, Severity, user_defined_b, state_d, query_hash_s, query_plan_hash_s, LogicalServerName_s, ElasticPoolName_s, DatabaseName_s

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project Database=_ResourceId, TimeGenerated, OptionName_s, OptionDesiredState_s, OptionActualState_s, OptionDisableReason_s, IsDisabledBySystem_d, DatabaseDesiredMode_s, DatabaseActualMode_s, LogicalServerName_s, DatabaseName_s, OperationName

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project Database=_ResourceId, TimeGenerated, State_s, Priority_d, RequestId_s, SessionId_s, LogicalServerName_s, Category, OperationName, ResourceGroup

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| where Status_s in~ ({Status}) or '*' in~ ({Status})
| project _ResourceId, TimeGenerated, RequestId_s, Status_s, StartTime_t, EndTime_t, Command_s, SessionId_s, SubmitTime_t, EndCompileTime_t, Label_s, DatabaseId_d, ResourceClass_s, StatementType_s, ScopeDepth_d, RootQueryId_s, ExplainOutput_s, LogicalServerName_s
| extend Details= pack_all()
| project Database=_ResourceId, TimeGenerated, RequestId_s, Status_s, StatementType_s, Command_s, Details

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project _ResourceId, ErrorId_g, RequestId_s, StepIndex_d, OperationType_s, DistributionType_s, LocationType_s, Status_s, StartTime_t, EndTime_t, RowCount_d, Command_s, LogicalServerName_s, TimeGenerated
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project Database=_ResourceId, RequestId_s, Status_s, Command_s, OperationType_s, TimeGenerated, Details

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project RequestId_s, StepIndex_d, Status_s, StartTime_t, EndTime_t, RowCount_d, Command_s, PdwNodeId_d, DistributionId_d, Spid_d, LogicalServerName_s, _ResourceId
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project Database=_ResourceId, Status_s, RequestId_s, StartTime_t, EndTime_t, Command_s, Details

AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category == '{Category}'
| project _ResourceId, DmsStepIndex_d, Type_s, BytesProcessed_d, RowsProcessed_d, CpuTime_d, SqlSpid_d, DmsCpid_d, SourceInfo_s, DestinationInfo_s, RequestId_s, StepIndex_d, State_s, StartTime_t, EndTime_t, PdwNodeId_d, DistributionId_d, LogicalServerName_s, TimeGenerated
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project Database=_ResourceId, DmsStepIndex_d, Type_s, DmsCpid_d, SourceInfo_s, RequestId_s, TimeGenerated, Details

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category != 'DmsWorkers'
| distinct Category

parameters.name: Status
parameters.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category in ({Category}) or '*' in ({Category})
| distinct Status_s
| where Status_s != ''

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where ResourceType == "SERVERS/DATABASES"
| where _ResourceId in~ ({SQLDWDBs}) or '*' in~ ({SQLDWDBs})
| where Category in ({Category}) or '*' in ({Category})
| where Status_s in ({Status}) or '*' in ({Status})
| where RequestId_s == '{RID}'
| project TimeGenerated, _ResourceId, RequestId_s, StepIndex_d, OperationType_s, DistributionType_s, LocationType_s, Status_s, StartTime_t, EndTime_t, RowCount_d, Command_s, SessionId_s, SubmitTime_t, EndCompileTime_t, DatabaseId_d, StatementType_s, RootQueryId_s, ExplainOutput_s, PdwNodeId_d, DistributionId_d
| extend Details=pack_all()
| project Database=_ResourceId, Details, RequestId_s, Status_s, TimeGenerated, Command_s
content.title: ExecRequests

items.name: text - execrequests for selected SessionID - Copy
